name: Hover Crane Panic
description:
bare bones functional, ran out of time, will update descriptions after deadline

for some reason, i couldn't figure out before time out... you start out flipped upside down... :( you have to roll youself over.

controls best with dual joystick controller

Left stick - pitch/roll
right stick - yaw

hold a button - try to pickup a cube. (the pickup zone in straight "below" the body of the crane, like a tractor beam)

technically you can fly with WASD but the functionality isn't as good, and you can't pickup the cube... :(  sorry

if the cubes go into the furnace they are removed.

"scoring" is done by rolling a dice and letting it settle ( a green number will appear above it) then taking that dice to the target pad down the hill.

all art assets made/edited/put together by me during the jam.  terrain chunk edited down from a 3d scan of a pile of rocks with like a million polygons.   the only thing i had when i started was the flight code .

at least its fun to fly around in it, even though the game mechanics and ui and umm most of it didn't get done in time.
